INC-001.title: API Gateway Timeout
INC-001.symptoms: Multiple 504 timeout errors reported by users during authentication. Connection pool exhaustion suspected.

INC-002.title: Database Corruption Detected
INC-002.symptoms: Checksum validation failures in production database logs. Data integrity at risk.

INC-003.title: Memory Leak in Background Worker
INC-003.symptoms: Background job processor shows continuous memory growth over 24h period, reaching 8GB usage.

INC-004.title: CDN Cache Miss Rate Spike
INC-004.symptoms: Cache hit rate dropped from 95% to 60% causing slower page loads
